titleStmt.title: Gods arrovves, or, Two sermons, concerning the visitation of God by the pestilence Very profitable to be read at all times, but especially in the time of Gods visitation. By William Warde minister of the word of God.
titleStmt.author: Ward, William, d. 1632.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
